job description
responsible for the operation and maintenance of waste water treatment plant. as operator position decomposed all aspects of modern technological work in processing water for industrial and other uses.
maintenance factor of equipments and proper checking of the plant equipment (before the operation), which often attached during treatment process such as (fouling, scaling,
corrosion) etc.
de-mineralization of water capacity 8 mgd, 9 mgd, 12 mgd and to check the correct balance of the cooling water chemistry i.e. (ph, hardness, conductivity etc.) to avoid
further disk-function of cooling tower or heat exchanger etc.
to have close look on the filter and valve functioning while pumping and back washing process. avoid water hammering etc. for smooth functioning.
position also decomposed in removing waste (solid material) and other impurities before cooling process to avoid further the mal functioning of the system and equipments.
and also check the meter reading. annually clean the raw water tank and related water tank. annual open the sand filters or gravel filter and clean inside it. co-ordinates and compares instructions, records analyzers, indication according to the laboratory analysis evaluation adjustments for records in hourly data.
to check the previous shift report, checks the logbook for maintain the scheduled strategies.
